repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a very well known erotic work by Kalyāṇamalla. It ends with the topi vividhasaṃbhoganirupaṇaṃ. On the front cover anaṃgaraṃga kalyāṇamallakṛta 350 samagra is written in Devanagari script. In the left corner number XXI is written in red ink and number 3 in pink chalk. 2nd blank folio with two lines has hariḥ oṃ harindrandane bhagavate [2 illegible syllables] nda me bhagavate On 1r in the left margin two lines are written : 1 hariḥ oṃ namo bhagavate maudgalāya namaḥ 2 hariḥ oṃ namaḥ vande (vānchilaxx)? vande vānchilamuni One verse is found on the same folio. line 1 ākāreṇa śaśigirāparabhṛtaḥ pārā ye naśvaraṃ ete haṃsaścakramaṇe imaṃ dadhītayā ratyāṃ vimukto gajaḥ line 2 itthaṃ bharttari [1 illegible syllable] samastayuvatisvāntyai pi daivādasaumadabhāgyena vivāhitaḥ patiritisyānnaikadoṣo yad .. Iine 4 on folio 10r is written in Telugu script and then again text continued in the Granth.

msItem.title: Anaṃgaraṃga
msItem.author: kalyāṇamalla

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 1- p:121 Harvard University — Anaṅgaraṅga h0326.html, h0858.html

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 datvā lākṣāṃ nakhāgre tadanusuradhunīdhautahastāgrabhāgaṃ bhaktyā bālasthalāglau tadanu nayanayo kañjalaṃ sanniveśya kaṇṭhe 1v 2 saṃprokṣya
msItem.explicit: 30v 4 t kuraṃgakhurasannibhaṃ kāmināṃ kāmadaṃ loke vande madanamandiraṃ … …. … iti loḍhi
msItem.finalRubric: 30v 5 śrīkavikalyāṇamallaviracite anaṃgaraṃge vividhasaṃbhoganirupaṇaṃ nā(ma da) (broken syllables due to wormholes) śamaṃ sthalaṃ

support.p: Thin palm leaf is used as cover.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 3 blank folio, 30 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left corner.
supportDesc.condition: good preserved with damaged corners and folio.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v

listBibl.bibl:
Kalyāṇamalla’s Anaṅgaraṅga critically edited with introduction and notes,
Richard Schmide Munster University Germany,

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ datvā lākṣāṃ nakhāgre tadanusuradhunīdhautahastāgrabhāgaṃ bhaktyā bālasthalāglau tadanu nayanayo kañjalaṃ sanniveśya kaṇṭhe 1v 2 saṃprokṣya
30v 1 dita paramārthaḥ kamaśāstrasya vidvān vividharativi (2 syllables crossed out) nodaiḥ kāminīnāṃ manāṃsi anudinamanurāgāñjayedyassalīlaṃ phalamavikalamevaprā 30v 2 pnuyājjanmanassaḥ .. yāvacchaṃkaramaulikāsuranadī gaurī tadardhāṅganā yāvatpremavatī payodhītanayā vaikuṇṭhanāthe harau tāvat….. 30v 3 ......... 30v 4 t kuraṃgakhurasannibhaṃ kāmināṃ kāmadaṃ loke vande madanamandiraṃ … …. … iti loḍhi 30v 5 śrīkavikalyāṇamallaviracite anaṃgaraṃge vividhasaṃbhoganirupaṇaṃ nā(ma da) (broken syllables due to wormholes) śamaṃ sthalaṃ
